name: Subponderance
description:
This game was made in under 1 week, from start to finish, for the 2022 Epic Megajam, which had the theme "As Above, So Below"

Game was submitted to the following special modifier categories:

  • Army of One
    • Game was made by a single person
  • Tiny But Mighty
    • Total size of the packaged playable game is less than 150MB
  • Use it or Lose It
    • Game uses only a single, 4 channel texture

Project Source will be made available for evaluation purposes after the submission deadline for the 2022 Epic Megajam: https://github.com/HunterVacui/hvJam_2022
